Package com.mc.helper

Class NavigateToScene

java.lang.Object
com.mc.helper.NavigateToScene
public abstract class NavigateToScene extends Object
Abstract class containing static methods for navigating between scenes in the application.

      public NavigateToScene()

  • Method Details

    • goToMainMenu

      public static void goToMainMenu(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, String view, boolean triggerApptNotifier, CurrentUser currentUser) throws IOException
      Navigates to the main menu scene with the specified view, sets the Current User and triggers the appointment notifier if required.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent that triggered the scene change.
      view - The appointment view to display in the main menu scene.
      triggerApptNotifier - Indicates if the appointment notifier should be triggered.
      currentUser - The current user of the application.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while loading the FXML file.

    • goToScene

      public static void goToScene(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, String fileName, CurrentUser currentUser) throws IOException
      Navigates to the specified scene and sets the current user.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent that triggered the scene change.
      fileName - The name of the FXML file to load.
      currentUser - The current user of the application.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while loading the FXML file.

    • goToScene

      public static void goToScene(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, String fileName, Object object, CurrentUser currentUser) throws IOException
      Navigates to the specified scene, sets the current user, and initializes the scene with the provided object.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent that triggered the scene change.
      fileName - The name of the FXML file to load.
      object - The object to be used for initializing the scene's controller.
      currentUser - The current user of the application.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while loading the FXML file.
